# gsedscripts

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The gsedscripts repository contains script to read, process, model, summarise and plot data collected within the [Global Scales of Early Development project](https://www.who.int/news/item/27-02-2023-who-rolls-out-new-holistic-way-to-measure-early-childhood-development) of the World Health Organisation (WHO).
